sqlMap.insert: insert into se_board (board_no, board_title, board_contents, board_createdate, user_id) values (se_seq.nextval, #title#, #contents#, #createDate#, #writer.id#)
sqlMap.select: select A.board_no as no, A.board_title as title, A.board_contents as contents, A.board_createdate as createDate, A.user_id as "writer.id" B.user_name as "writer.name" from se_board A, se_user B where A.user_id = B.user_id order by A.board_no desc
